lead_paragraph: President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela ordered the expropriation of the country's largest privately owned steel producer on Sunday, the latest in a series of takeovers that has raised concerns among business leaders.
snippet: President Hugo Chavez of Venezuela ordered the expropriation of the country's largest privately owned steel producer Sunday, the latest in a series of takeovers that has raised concerns among business leaders.

headline.main: Chávez Orders Seizure of Venezuelan Steel Maker
